activities: These data are transferred to the US for use in the company's business operations in the area of: administration of its human resources obligations; product customization or development; clinical research; complaint handling; regulatory, compliance and trade compliance; marketing research regarding its products; marketing and sale of its products; training on the safe and effective use of Biomet´s products; finance, and tax activities; corporate transactions; and other legal and business activities.
corpofftitle1: Senior Vice President, General Counsel and Secretary
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Data including manually processed data re: present & former employees (incl family members),clinical and medical research subjects and investigators and staff;  patients; customers; consumers; vendors; distributors and agents; and other business partners.
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Agencies and Swiss Data Protection and Information Commissioner.
